channel.title: 3 bugs fixes need to be dealt
channel.description:
1. when you switch to ancient prayers and relog comes in normal prayers. constantly. and my server is a auto saver. 2. in duel arena on the lash\attack. when ur using a whip. it keep shows mage\combat so on. 3. when you click on the normal prayer book. it says "youare not on the right prayer book"
Note from staff member: Payments aren't allowed, if you readd what I've removed you will be infracted.

item.title: 3 bugs fixes need to be dealt
item.dc:creator: @Null_Amount N_A
item.description:
@Null_Amount wrote:

Payment is against the rules, I’d edit that out of the post.

  1. Make sure that the server is saving what prayer book the player is on.
  2. Clarify.
  3. Search in your files for the message and see what code causes it to be output?

Read full topic
item.source: 3 bugs fixes need to be dealt
